Directions: Place the lettuce on a large serving platter. Arrange the salami, cheeses, tomatoes and olives over top. Sprinkle with chives. In a blender, combine the remaining ingredients; cover and process until smooth. Drizzle over salad.
Ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can pitted ripe olives , drained, halved
1/4 cup red wine vinegar or cider vinegar
